Thanks in advance.

• windows forms, map.OnMarkerClick and item.LocalPosition
  • wpf, just add context menu to your shape/marker

Hi radioman,

             Thanks for your reply.. I am new developer in .net .I am using GMap in windows application.

 What is need is when i right click on the marker tool tip, i want display softmeu or context menu.

Can you please send me code for adding the contextmenustrip to the marker tool tip.

Thanks in advance

If your new to .net, msdn is your best friend. Inside the OnMarkerClick event, add code to create the context menu at the position of the marker (as radioman said, item.LocalPosition).  Here's the code from msdn for creating a context menu from msdn http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.windows.controls.contextmenu.aspx . If you don't know what events are, long story short you write a method, and you 'subscribe' that method to the OnMarkerClick event, and every time the marker is clicked, it executes the code in the method. Hope this helps...
